name: Hidden Entrance to Dwarven Complex
description: A well-hidden doorway carved into the rock, adorned with ancient dwarven runes. This is the party's access to the Ancient Dwarven Stronghold Areea and specifically the Dwarven Complex - First Floor
accessibility: Accessible via the Hidden Passage; requires solving a puzzle to open.
plotHooks: The dwarven runes might hold clues about the complex beyond.

features.name: Dwarven Runes
features.description: Ancient runes that glow faintly when approached.

features.name: Stone Mechanism
features.description: A complex stone mechanism that seems to control the door.

dcChecks.description: Understand the significance of the runes.
Solve the puzzle to open the hidden door.

doors.name: Hidden Dwarven Door
doors.description: A stone door concealed within the rock face.
